name: BigSchlong
wish:
‚ñ™Ô∏é Hey buddy, happy birthday!! My mans. Oof time sure flies. Been 3 years or so since I've known you. Though I felt like we never had the time to fully understand each other, but the time we did spend, was every bit worth it. Still remember those days we'd argue about a movie, some marvel/DC bs or have geeky discussions on topics.

‚ñ™Ô∏éI also deeply remember when you genuinely helped me during our board exams, by sending me notes when I was in a pickle, helping clear my doubts before exams and many more. I still remember consulting you about what to do before physics boards because I opened my book for the first time, 2 days before the exam. If it wasnt for all that, who knows how poorly I would've done.

‚ñ™Ô∏éEvery moment spent with you was fun and exciting. The banter we had, shit we talked about, everything. Nothing was amiss, even the heated arguments and all the toxicity we had at times. Everything. I'll most certainly never ever forget. I've said it before, and will say it again, you're my joke buddy, my joke sidekick!

(^ ^)b.

Been a long ride, and I'm happy to spend it with you.

♥

name: definetly-not-Ameesha
wish:
Hello aradhan
Namaste
During my first days in isb, I spoke to no one. And then you and Dennis had to keep coming to my place to give books and you both smiled out of awkwardness. So in my attempts to ‚Äúmake friends‚Äù I came over to both of you and asked you your names. I asked you to repeat your name 4-5 times and still didn‚Äôt get it.
I remember thinking, man, this school is going to suck. Fast forward to today, yes, school sucked. But you made it bearable. But you didn‚Äôt stop there, every day beginning March, you sent stupid meemees and terrible mental health jokes. I laugh every time I open your messages, not because they‚Äôre funny, but because they‚Äôre really stupid and only you can send ridiculous things like that.
So thank you, for making me laugh, on bright days and terrible nights. I hope I can return the favor some day. I will not miss you because it looks like we still have a long way to go and you‚Äôre not that far away so don‚Äôt cry.
You‚Äôre a wonderful human being, but I‚Äôll never ever ever ever ever call you Batman. I will not.
Happy birthday not-Batman
Have a good one
Have many many more.

name: Hima
wish: Happy Birthday Aradhan. yeah.....now what? oh yeah you're 18 now bend ove-. jk...unlessüëÄ. well I've wished you on so many of your birthdays idk what to say anymore. but honestly, even though we keep having our ups and downs, at the end if the day I'm glad that I'm your friend. its been an honor to be able to grow and learn about life with you around helping me through it(lmao we're just 18 and i sound 50). this is just the beginning. too soon for us to give up. there's a lot to come your way. and I wanna be there for all your good news. and i wanna be able to help you get through your bad times(ik I'm not great at it hut I try giving it an honest shot). You have no idea how much you have inspired me throughout the years. there have been countless times when ive just looked up to you and learnt to better deal with the problems at hand. A part of your personality is embedded in me(the jokes mostly). and i just want you to know that we all love you. and you're really precious to me. we may or may not be in regular touch with each other once you find pussy and cocaine in canada, but I'll be at peace cuz deep down I know very well that i have made a friend for a lifetime.
